data.persona: We are allied to no-one but gold. Coins and gems are the currency of blood. I would raze a thousand villages for a thousand coins.
data.description:
You are in the Black Smiths shop.
Its hot, the fire glows as it prepares to accept new iron to be melted down. The forge is large and contained by a stone like well. Nearby his wooden workbench is full of hammers and tongs used for making several items. The forge is outside it seems no building is needed to be a blacksmith.
There's a stone, a wooden workbench, a tool, a hammers, an iron, a The forge, two tongs, and a hammer here.
The child is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the child to take me to the back of the Blacksmith shop
data.mid_motivation: I want to get a special sword from the blacksmith today
data.long_motivation: I need the sword for the coming campaign in two weeks

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go Behind the Black Smith's shop
